author: oldhamtj
body: I have tested the package installation and basic function on Oracle Linux 7 and added text to reflect this in the installation instructions.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@oldhamtj**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

title: Added Oracle Linux 7 installation status.
